[60FPS (Hold R button for 30FPS)]
D3000000 00000000
204F67E0 00000001
204F67FC 00000001
DD000000 00000200
204F67E0 00000002
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000100
204F67E0 00000002
204F67FC 00000002
D0000000 00000000
{Hold L to speed up when FPS drops to 30FPS.
Codes by @Hazerou}

[++FPS++]

[60FPS]
204F67E0 00000001
204F67FC 00000001
DD000000 00000200
204F67E0 00000002
D0000000 00000000
{Hold L to speed up when FPS drops to 30FPS.
Codes by @Hazerou}

[Default 30FPS]
204F67E0 00000002
204F67FC 00000002
{Codes by @Hazerou}

[--]
